model.agent
Class AbstractAgent

java.lang.Object
  model.agent.property.PropertiesObject
      model.agent.AbstractAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentView
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyAgent, IndexAgent, MenuAgent, SearchAgent, StatsAgent
public abstract class AbstractAgent
extends PropertiesObject
implements AgentView

This abstract class implements the AgentView interface, and must be extended by every agent implementation

Author:
Gijs B. Roest
